channel.title: Good Starter Source?
channel.description:
I am in the making of my first server now, and I would like a good source to start that is NOT:
Dodian Czar

item.title: Good Starter Source?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

[quote="• Java Maybe •, post:12, topic:199941"][quote author=ownageownt link=topic=264607.msg2187564#msg2187564 date=1208232832]
Lol, like I said you basically down to nothing. Everything these days are based of czar or dodian.
[/quote]

WTF is CZar? I’m in this community for about 2 years and I never fucking heard of it.[/quote]

Lol? And I know you’ve been here for a while…Czar is the most commonly used server I think. Starting point @ burthorpe and vengeance on emotes…Hiyascape is based off of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Good Starter Source?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I was thinking of RuneJava by rune-server but they are never up anymore so I don’t know a dl link. The ones you told me are pretty old and im not familiar with them, except TestScape but I have only played TestScape not coded it.

Still open for suggestions

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2008, 05:31:51 PM[/size][hr]Well I tried dodian, I like it, but I don’t get their autospawn.cfg, of course I didn’t spend long looking at its coding, but I was used to czars autospawn so idk how to spawn npcs on dodian. Also there is always the duping…

Read full topic

item.title: Good Starter Source?
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

[quote=“alexplt178, post:11, topic:199941”][quote author=ownageownt link=topic=264607.msg2187607#msg2187607 date=1208233397]

project 16 , fr33sc4p3 pkz, testscape,cheezscape

All which don’t have the modern protection that you need.

Try Dodian, probably the most stable source out there yet.
[/quote]
DONT… Every one has the same gay source! use the ones we all learend on the ones you can actualy learn how to code not the messy crap ignor the noob who posted above…[/quote]

Actually, no. I know what I’m talking about, and apparently before you call dodian “messy crap” look at your typing.

Read full topic
